rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3120, F6001}

description: This unit engages with architectural techniques set within a broad range of social, cultural, environmental, political, economic, historical, theoretical and technical contexts. Investigations will incorporate various methodologies and approaches. The unit examines the formulation, application and implications of techniques in relation to architectural design research. The unit advances critical understanding required to shape the built environment.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
